overview: Deep in guerrilla territory two female Black Tigers train for the ultimate mission. Condemned as terrorists by the world, they regard themselves as their people's last hope against a superior oppressor. "Front Toward Enemy" are the words imprinted on the Claymore mine they will strap on their bodies if they are sent on the final mission.
tagline: Why do two young girls choose to become suicide bombers?
title: My Daughter the Terrorist
